sql.where:
AND 1 = 1
AND ORIGINAL_TEXT like '%' || #{originalText,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND TRANSLATION like '%' || #{translation,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND CREATE_PID = #{createPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and CREATE_DATE >= to_date(#{createDateBegin},'yyyy-mm-dd')
and CREATE_DATE < to_date(#{createDateEnd},'yyyy-mm-dd')+1

mapper.select:
SELECT t.*,@rownum := @rownum + 1 AS rownum FROM ( SELECT @rownum := 0, t1.ID AS id, t1.COMPANY_NAME AS companyName, t1.COMPANY_CODE AS companyCode, t1.CONTACT AS telphone, t1.E_MAIL AS email, t1.INVOICE_ADRESS AS invoiceAdress, t1.REPORT_ADRESS AS reportAdress, t1.CREATE_PID AS createPid, t2.USER_NAME AS userName, t1.STATUS AS status, t1.REMARKS AS remarks, DATE_FORMAT(t1.CREATE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T ') AS createDateStr FROM BUS_APPLICATION t1 LEFT JOIN BUS_USER t2 ON (t1.CREATE_PID=t2.ID) WHERE 1 = 1
AND t1.COMPANY_NAME LIKE concat('%',#{companyName},'%')
AND t1.COMPANY_CODE LIKE concat('%',#{companyCode},'%')
AND t1.REPORT_ADRESS LIKE concat('%',#{reportAdress},'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(#{createDateBegin}, '%Y-%m-%d') <= t1.CREATE_DATE
AND DATE_FORMAT(#{createDateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d') >= t1.CREATE_DATE
ORDER BY t1.CREATE_DATE DESC ) t
LIMIT #{begin},#{end}
